text:
@derekjames150 Johnson's attitude towards the health risks of Covid19 was summed up by his bizarre 'Clark Kent' speech on Feb 3rd & again with the 'Shaking Hands' one a month later.  

He doesn't care risking peoples lives & believes he can contradict scientific advice with incoherent bullshit.
